mapper.select: SELECT MAIL_NO, SEND, LISTAGG(RECEIVE,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY RECEIVE) AS RECEIVE, TITLE, CONTENT, ENROLL_DATE, STAR, LISTAGG(REFERENCE,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY REFERENCE) AS REFERENCE, READ_YN FROM ( SELECT M.MAIL_NO , E.NICK SEND , EE.NICK RECEIVE , M.TITLE , M.CONTENT , M.ENROLL_DATE , R.STAR , R.REFERENCE , R.READ_YN FROM MAIL M INNER JOIN MAIL_RECEIVE R ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON M.SEND = E.EMP_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE EE ON R.RECEIVE = EE.EMP_NO WHERE R.STATUS=0 AND R.RECEIVE=#{receive} AND R.REFERENCE IS NULL ) GROUP BY MAIL_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, ENROLL_DATE, STAR, READ_YN, SEND

SELECT M.MAIL_NO , E.NICK SEND , EE.NICK RECEIVE , M.TITLE , M.CONTENT FROM MAIL M JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_NO = M.SEND JOIN MAIL_RECEIVE R ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE EE ON EE.EMP_NO = R.RECEIVE WHERE R.STATUS = 0 AND M.MAIL_NO = #{mailNo} AND R.RECEIVE = #{receive} AND R.REFERENCE IS NULL

SELECT LISTAGG(E.NICK,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY R.REFERENCE) AS REFERENCE FROM MAIL_RECEIVE R JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_NO = R.REFERENCE JOIN MAIL M ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO WHERE R.MAIL_NO = #{mailNo} AND R.RECEIVE=#{receive} AND R.STATUS=0

SELECT LISTAGG(E.NICK,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY R.REFERENCE) AS REFERENCE FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT REFERENCE , MAIL_NO , STATUS FROM MAIL_RECEIVE ) R JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_NO = R.REFERENCE JOIN MAIL M ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO WHERE R.MAIL_NO =#{mailNo} AND R.REFERENCE=#{reference} AND R.STATUS=0

SELECT MAIL_NO, SEND, TITLE, CONTENT, ENROLL_DATE, STAR FROM ( SELECT M.MAIL_NO , E.NICK SEND , M.TITLE , M.CONTENT , M.ENROLL_DATE , R.STAR , R.READ_YN FROM MAIL M INNER JOIN MAIL_RECEIVE R ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON M.SEND = E.EMP_NO WHERE R.STATUS=0 AND R.REFERENCE=#{reference} ) WHERE MAIL_NO = #{mailNo} group by MAIL_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, ENROLL_DATE, STAR, READ_YN, SEND

SELECT M.MAIL_NO , E.NICK SEND , M.TITLE , M.CONTENT , M.ENROLL_DATE , R.STAR , R.REFERENCE , R.READ_YN FROM MAIL M INNER JOIN MAIL_RECEIVE R ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON R.RECEIVE = E.EMP_NO WHERE R.STATUS=0 AND R.RECEIVE=#{empNo} AND R.STAR = 'Y' OR R.REFERENCE=#{empNo} AND R.STAR = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(READ_YN) FROM MAIL_RECEIVE WHERE STATUS=0 AND RECEIVE=#{receive} AND REFERENCE IS NULL AND READ_YN = 'N'
SELECT MAIL_ATT_NO , MAIL_NO , NAME , ORIGIN_NAME , ENROLL_DATE FROM MAIL_ATT WHERE MAIL_NO = #{mailNo}

SELECT MAIL_NO, SEND, LISTAGG(RECEIVE,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY RECEIVE) AS RECEIVE, TITLE, CONTENT, ENROLL_DATE, STAR, READ_YN FROM ( SELECT M.MAIL_NO , E.NICK SEND , EE.NICK RECEIVE , M.TITLE , M.CONTENT , M.ENROLL_DATE , R.STAR , R.REFERENCE , R.READ_YN FROM MAIL M INNER JOIN MAIL_RECEIVE R ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON M.SEND = E.EMP_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE EE ON R.RECEIVE = EE.EMP_NO WHERE R.STATUS=0 AND R.REFERENCE=#{reference} ) GROUP BY MAIL_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, ENROLL_DATE, STAR, READ_YN, SEND

SELECT MAIL_NO, LISTAGG(RECEIVE,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY RECEIVE) AS RECEIVE, TITLE, CONTENT, ENROLL_DATE, STAR, LISTAGG(REFERENCE,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY REFERENCE) AS REFERENCE FROM ( SELECT M.MAIL_NO , EE.NICK RECEIVE , M.TITLE , M.CONTENT , M.ENROLL_DATE , R.STAR , R.REFERENCE , R.READ_YN FROM MAIL M INNER JOIN MAIL_RECEIVE R ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON M.SEND = E.EMP_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE EE ON R.RECEIVE = EE.EMP_NO WHERE R.STATUS=0 AND M.SEND=#{send} AND R.REFERENCE IS NULL ) GROUP BY MAIL_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, ENROLL_DATE, STAR

SELECT M.MAIL_NO , E.NICK SEND , LISTAGG(EE.NICK,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY R.RECEIVE) AS RECEIVE , M.TITLE , M.CONTENT FROM MAIL_RECEIVE R JOIN MAIL M ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_NO = M.SEND JOIN EMPLOYEE EE ON EE.EMP_NO = R.RECEIVE WHERE R.STATUS = 0 AND M.MAIL_NO = #{mailNo} AND M.SEND = #{send} AND R.REFERENCE IS NULL group by M.MAIL_NO, E.NICK, M.TITLE, M.CONTENT

SELECT LISTAGG(E.NICK,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY R.REFERENCE) AS REFERENCE FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT REFERENCE , MAIL_NO , STATUS FROM MAIL_RECEIVE ) R JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_NO = R.REFERENCE JOIN MAIL M ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO WHERE R.MAIL_NO = #{mailNo} AND M.SEND=#{send} AND R.STATUS=0

SELECT MAIL_NO, SEND, TITLE, CONTENT, ENROLL_DATE, STAR, READ_YN, STATUS FROM ( SELECT M.MAIL_NO , E.NICK SEND , M.TITLE , M.CONTENT , M.ENROLL_DATE , R.STAR , R.READ_YN , R.STATUS FROM MAIL M INNER JOIN MAIL_RECEIVE R ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON M.SEND = E.EMP_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE EE ON R.RECEIVE = EE.EMP_NO WHERE R.RECEIVE=#{receive} OR R.REFERENCE=#{reference} ) WHERE STATUS = 1 GROUP BY MAIL_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, ENROLL_DATE, STAR, READ_YN, SEND , STATUS

SELECT M.MAIL_NO , E.NICK SEND , EE.NICK RECEIVE , M.TITLE , M.CONTENT FROM MAIL_RECEIVE R JOIN MAIL M ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_NO = M.SEND JOIN EMPLOYEE EE ON EE.EMP_NO = R.RECEIVE WHERE R.STATUS = 1 AND M.MAIL_NO = #{mailNo}
SELECT E.NICK REFERENCE FROM MAIL_RECEIVE R JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_NO = R.REFERENCE JOIN MAIL M ON M.MAIL_NO = R.MAIL_NO WHERE R.MAIL_NO = #{mailNo} AND R.STATUS=1
SELECT DRAFT_NO AS MAIL_NO , SEND , RECEIVE , TITLE , ENROLL_DATE FROM DRAFT D WHERE D.STATUS=0 AND SEND=#{empNo}
SELECT * FROM DRAFT WHERE STATUS = 0 AND DRAFT_NO = #{mailNo}
